definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="lootchanceGunpowder">lootchanceGunpowder</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="78" y="70"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:lootchanceGunpowder</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="explode"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:lootchanceGunpowder</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="spawn_gem"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.GUNPOWDER</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
